name: Voluntary Club
description:
Voluntary Club is a visual novel developed by two Filipinos (Yuri and Justin)  

Voluntary Club is a slice of life game that shows different possible outcomes of a specific situations.  It is the player to decide which choices is the best answer in solving problems.  You will play as Ishida, an introvert guy who dislikes humans and finds them disgusting but all of this changed since he met a certain person who had a strong desire to help others with the help of the two members of the club. 

The demo of this game have three different endings.

Synopsis of this Demo

Ishida and his fellow members of the club will face a certain problem that mostly relevant  to school tasks, group project and other school activities. It will shows how the relationship between a group of people change instantly from a happy go lucky group to a group full of hatred.  This problem will greatly affect ishida's relationship with the 2 members but it didn't affect ishida at all. He suddenly remember those words that gave him hope to trust humans again, words that changed his perception to every people around him.
